div.class: custom_35846 img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated wow animated zoomIn

span.span: Governor Abbott issued an executive order closing all schools for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.

Richards ISD will continue to provide educational services, daily support, and resources for students during this time. RISD will continue to work with the commissioner of education and TEA on moving forward.
We are working diligently on plans for graduation and hope to have something finalized in the upcoming weeks.

We are all very sad that we will not see your childâ€™s smiling face each and every day. Please know that we are still committed, willing and ready to serve you and your child no matter what challenges we face.
Thank you for your support and cooperation as we ensure that all members of the community in Richards ISD stay safe and healthy.
TheÂ Richards ISDÂ community must work together to fight COVID-19. Â Head toÂ
for vitally important public health guidance to stop the spread. If we stand apart as a community now, we will be together again soon.
Your studentâ€™s username and password is their first name and last name without any spaces followed by @risd, and their password is Risd and their lunch number.
User names for most students are:
If for some reason you cannot login send an email to Mrs. Mitchell at lmitchell@richardsisd.net.

div.p: TORNADO WATCH 122 IS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR THE FOLLOWING LOCATIONS TX . TEXAS COUNTIES INCLUDED ARE ANGELINA BRAZORIA CHAMBERS FORT BEND GALVESTON HARDIN HARRIS JASPER JEFFERSON LIBERTY MONTGOMERY NACOGDOCHES NEWTON ORANGE POLK SABINE SAN AUGUSTINE SAN JACINTO SHELBY TRINITY TYLER WALKER
